title: Ka vanram in nuam tak kawng chu kraws a ni
lyrics:
Ka vanram in nuam tak kawng chu kraws a ni,
Chu lo chu kawng a awm lo;
Ka thleng lo vang, Lalpa min siam in chu,
Kraws nunna kawng chu ka hloh chuan.

Ka van in kawng kraws a ni. (2)
Ka kal chhungin ka kawng hmuh zel ka duh,
Ka van in kawng - Lalpa kraws chu.

Ka vanram in kawng kraws ka zawh tan laiin,
Ka phurrit a lum bo va;
Lalpa eng a lo lang a, ka zawh ta,
Ka rilru hlimin a lo khat.

Ka Lalpain ka kawng kraws a zawh hmasa,
Ka tan kraws chungah thiin,
Kawng hrehawm leh ralti a lo zawh chu,
Ka tan nunna kawng a lo ni.

Chuvangin, ka khawvel nun hlui ka thlah ta,
Hawi kir leh tawh lo turin,
Ka Lalpan vanram kawtchhuahah min au,
Ka thlen hma loh chu min lo nghak.
